lead_paragraph: In the wacky world of recruiting, Michigan coach Jim Harbaugh sleeping over at a prospect's house somehow makes perfect sense.

headline.print_headline: Recruiting Stunts Help Coaches Stand Out in Social Media Age
headline.main: Recruiting Stunts Help Coaches Stand Out in Social Media Age
